  • Learning Center

Bilingual Digital Marketing Assistant Internship (Chinese/English)

  • Irvine, CA
  • Remote

Job Description

We are looking for candidates who are passionate about education, marketing and management.

Responsibilities

  • Optimize and expand social (Facebook/Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, WeChat, Youtube) and other digital programs.
  • Identify new areas of opportunity within existing placements and channels, as well as evaluate and test new opportunities.
  • Utilize social platforms to nurture leads into enrollments.

Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
  • Bilingual Chinese and English required.
  • Proficient at using Office, Google Doc, and WeChat.
  • Proficient with writing, presenting, and executing effective communications and marketing plans in both Chinese and English.
  • Friendly, cooperative manner, and patience in dealing with students, parents, instructors.

Preferred Experience

  • Familiar with PhotoShop is preferred.

Benefits

  • Place here.
